comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "The old Arsenal gun shot tower and the building it graces still stand on the grounds of Florida State Hospital in Chattahoochee. The building is now used as a ward for patients. Rooms in the tower, which boasts a fireproof vault from its early history, are used mostly for storage."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
